issue_description: Possible trip hazard due to settlement and common cracking.
issue_summary: Suggest repair/replacement as needed to ensure safety.

issue_description: Deterioration of wooden frames and fog/condensation in Thermopane windows indicating a failed seal.
issue_summary: Recommending review for repair or replacement as necessary.
additional_information: Windows/frames are near the end of their useful life due to age and condensation.

issue_description: Peeling paint and worn out caulking observed.
issue_summary: Suggest scraping and painting as necessary.

issue_description: Loose at several areas.
Longer copper pipe noted, could freeze and burst in winter if not winterized.
Deck railing is non-compliant as it offers 'climbing bars'.
issue_summary: Recommending replacement by railing with vertical spacing not exceeding 4".
additional_information: The support posts are not in ground or properly sitting in the footing. Foundation for the deck is tilted causing the structure to lean.

issue_description: Recommending review by a qualified professional for repair or replacement as necessary.
Recommending consultation with qualified contractor for replacement quotations in order to budget.
Bottom door panel is water damaged/deteriorated.
issue_summary: Recommending review for repair or replacement as necessary.

issue_description: Chain needs to be tightened.
issue_summary: Recommend review for repair or replacement as necessary.

issue_description: Evidence of past water penetration observed.
issue_summary: Recommend review for repair or replacement as necessary.

issue_description: Original windows noted, these windows do not meet modern standards.
issue_summary: Upgrade would greatly enhance overall comfort and efficiency.

issue_description: Minor corrosion observed, no leaks visible at time of inspection.
AFCI protection in bedroom branch circuits is a new requirement, not present in this house.
issue_summary: Recommending adding as safety enhancement feature.
additional_information: Double tapping observed. Burned or scorched wiring observed, recommend review by a licensed electrician.

issue_description: Suggest sealing all openings with aluminum tape.
The condenser is tilted, excessive uneven settlement can cause fractures in refrigerant line fittings and loss of refrigerant.
additional_information: Air conditioning unit was tested and is NOT in the working condition due no cold air, as per inspectors opinion the air conditioner is near the end of its useful life due to age. Replacement is necessary. Client is advised to budget.

issue_description: The TPR valve is missing.
issue_summary: Suggest installing required temperature pressure relief valve as a safety measure prior to closing.

issue_description: Working condition at the time of inspection but due to age, and noisy motor it is end of its life.
Recommend changing filter due it is touching the fan.
Cracked / Chipped tiles noted.
issue_summary: Recommend review by a qualified professional for repair or replacement, as necessary, prior to close.
additional_information: In the inspectors opinion the floor is near the end of its useful life due to grout damage or lose tiles near toilet and entrance areas.

issue_description: Drain stopper is inoperable. Sink needs to be changed due condition. Sink drains very slow, needs repair.
additional_information: Sink appears to have been refinished, suggest taking care when cleaning to protect the surface.

issue_description: A loose toilet and/or loose/soft sub-flooring was observed.
issue_summary: Client is advised to seek further review by a licensed plumbing contractor prior to closing for repairs/replacement as required.
additional_information: This can indicate damage to the sub-flooring beneath the fixture and floor covering.

issue_description: Evidence of past water penetration observed.
issue_summary: Recommend review for repair or replacement as necessary.

issue_description: A wood burning fireplace is noted in this home.
issue_summary: It is strongly suggested that this fireplace be cleaned and inspected before close.
additional_information: Please be advised that this item may only be lawfully inspected by a WETT-certified contractor and then, only after a thorough cleaning.
